content: stitch is knit chart on page 3 round 1 *2mc 3cc 3mc repeat from * around rounds 2-4 *1mc 5cc 2mc repeat from * around round 5 repeat round 1 round 6 *3mc 1cc repeat from * around round 7 *2mc 2cc 4mc repeat from * around round 8 mc knit round 9 mc sl1 knit to end rounds 10-12 mc knit rounds 13-18 repeat rounds 1-6 round 19 *3mc 2cc 3mc repeat from * around rounds 20-24 mc repeat rounds 8-12 top edge switch to the rib needles and cc cut the mc with a tail long enough to weave in final round 1 knit final round 2 sl1 k1 p2 *k2 p2 repeat from * around continue in 2x2 rib until you have the same amount of row as the bottom edge including final round 1 bind off sample binds off in pattern weave in your ends block your project & enjoy check out my other free patterns here and popular patterns here and check out my youtube channel for lots of free knitting tutorials pumpkin lane cowl - the blue mouse 2024 2 pumpkin chart for round 21 slip the 1st stitch of the round then knit to the end for round 9 slip the 1st stitch of the round then knit to the end pumpkin lane cowl - the blue mouse 2024 3
